content: this is a very easy pattern intended for absolute beginners granny squares are a staple in the world of crochet and i wanted to make something simple but practical to have as a first-time project it works up to about a 3 gallon mesh bag but could be easily adapted to be wider or longer this pattern is made to be constructed with ~160 yds of any aran weight yarn using a 6mm hook and it is written in us terminology the tutorial photos show a bag made with three different colors caron simply soft paints in oceana ~45 yds lionbrand heartland in king s canyon ~53 yds red heart super saver solids in aran ~60 yds
